The 17 Best Resorts in Vizag - Vizag Tourism Home Places to Visit Tour Packages Contact Us The 17 Best Resorts in Vizag A coastal city in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh, Vizag also goes by the name Visakhapatnam. The city has many beaches that are popular tourist attractions, including Ramakrishna Beach and Yarada Beach. The beachfront is notable for its esplanade which stretches out along 2 kilometres of sea frontage. It has a lot to offer tourists, from historical sites to natural beauty to seaside activities. Tourism is important to the economy of Vizag and thus it offers a lot of resorts to accommodate the large numbers of tourists that visit the city. Most resorts in Vizag offer stunning views of the Bay of Bengal allowing guests to enjoy a lavish stay amidst nature. Equipped with modern amenities, they offer you world-class luxury and convenience. Depending upon your budget you can opt for lavish or budget-friendly stay options in Vizag. The resorts in Vizag are renowned for their professional services. Most resorts are perfect for solo trips, honeymoons, and family stays as they offer enough security and privacy. Here is a list of the best resorts in Vizag to help you plan a comfortable trip to Vizag. 01 of 17 Novotel Visakhapatnam Varun Beach Resort Novotel Visakhapatnam Varun Beach Resort overlooks Ramakrishna Beach, offering guests the best of modern architecture and natural charm. Their spacious rooms provide stunning views of the Bay of Bengal. All their rooms feature facilities like a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar, a safe deposit box, and a tea or coffee machine. You can unwind with a soak in the hot tub or indulge in a sauna session. Business travellers can utilise currency exchange and concierge services at the business centre. International cuisine is served all day long at their in-house restaurant - The Square. Amazing views of the sea complement the exquisite Indian cuisine served at Zaffran restaurant. Sugar is their in-house cafe serving freshly baked goodies such as pastries and Gourmet chocolates. You can enjoy the astounding views of the sun setting over the Bay of Bengal while sipping on fine-blended cocktails at their rooftop bar & restaurant known as Infinity. Class: 5-Star Resort Location: Beach Rd, Krishna Nagar, Maharani Peta, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530002 Price: INR 6,500 to 19,500 per night Distance: 3.6 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 9.7 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Wi-Fi, laundry service, glass-wall bathrooms, business desk, library, salon, fitness centre, airport transfers, free parking, buffet, babysitting facility, Online check-in facility, and currency exchange. Private Swimming Pool: No, infinity pool 02 of 17 The Gateway Beach Road Resort The Gateway Hotel Beach Road is one of the most luxurious resorts in Vizag offered by the Taj Hotel. The marvellous architecture of the resort is complemented by the panoramic views of Bay of Bengal. Centrally located, the property allows you easy access to most tourist spots and commercial centres in the city. The air-conditioned rooms are classified as standard rooms, executive sea-view rooms and executive suites. You can enjoy splendid views of the resort’s verdant garden or witness the beauty of the sea from your room. The plush furnishings of the room are accompanied by modern amenities such as an in-room safe, mini bar, iron board, and free Wi-Fi. GAD is the resort’s all-day dining restaurant serving delectable meals from Indian and South Indian cuisines. Ming Garden is their specialty Chinese restaurant. You can also head to Lawson's Lounge for a drink and some relaxing music. The resort also has arrangements for events and gatherings of all sizes. You can pick from Turner Hall, Godavari Deck Open Venue, and Carmichael Hall to make your event a successful affair. Class: 5-Star Resort Location: Beach Rd, Pandurangapuram, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530002 Price: INR 3,549 to 21,000 per night Distance: 4 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 10 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Wi-Fi, laundry service, multilingual staff, salon, Spa and massage centre, Golf, arrangements for differently-abled guests, doctor on call, fitness centre, airport transfers, free parking, buffet, babysitting facility and kid’s meals, pet bowls, Online check-in facility, private entrance, and currency exchange. Private Swimming Pool: No, only a public pool 03 of 17 The Park Visakhapatnam Resort The Park Visakhapatnam Resort is one of the finest hotels in Andhra Pradesh located on Beach Road, Visakhapatnam. The hotel has luxuriously furnished guest rooms and suites where you can relax at ease after a long day at work or on a sightseeing tour. The hotel offers panoramic views of the beautiful landscape as it overlooks the Bay of Bengal. The Park Visakhapatnam Resort has lavish rooms with modern facilities. The four types of rooms are Park Luxury Room, Luxury Premium Room, Executive Suite, and Deluxe Suites. Room amenities include air conditioning with the individual control system, LED television, mini bar unit, tea/coffee maker, work desk area in the room and uninterrupted internet facility. It houses world-class dining facilities where you can satiate your taste buds with delicacies from its multicuisine restaurants. Rise up to a wide variety of regional and continental food for breakfast. Their upbeat bar is perfect for enjoying a drink in the evening. Rejuvenate at their spa or unwind as you enjoy the view of the lush park and sea from your hotel room. The hotel also has facilities such as parking, conference hall, banquet hall, and business centre suitable for small or large gatherings. Class: 5-Star Resort Location: VUDA Park Light House R k, Beach Rd, Lawsons Bay Colony, Pedda Waltair, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530023 Price: INR 5,000 per night Distance: 7 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 15 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Private Beach, Private balcony, Fitness centre, airport transportation, bar/lounge, Multicuisine Restaurants, special suites for couples, Spa, Manicured Gardens and more. Private Swimming Pool: No, only a public pool 04 of 17 Palm Beach Resort The Palm Beach Resort is an artistic hotel near the famous Ramkrishna Beach. The heritage resort dates back to 1942 and offers a luxurious stay for a rejuvenating vacation. Ideal for both families and business travellers, the hotel provides spacious rooms overlooking the Bay of Bengal. The private beach allows you to unwind amidst nature. They provide single and double rooms with rustic interiors and modern facilities. The unique decor is complemented by facilities such as Wi-Fi, an air conditioner, a mini-fridge, flat-screen TVs, and a safe deposit box. Scrumptious meals are served at Dusk, their in-house restaurant. You can indulge in lip-smacking food and soul-soothing music as you enjoy the rustic setting of the restaurant. Masalah Mafia is another in-house eatery offering breakfast, lunch and dinner buffets. The Mafia Bar is a multi-cuisine restaurant and event space. It wins hearts with delectable dishes served amidst vibrant vistas of the courtyard and a pool. The resort also provides open-air dining with views of the Bay of Bengal. The Sun Deck is the perfect place for a romantic meal on the beachfront. A fully-equipped business centre, board rooms, banquet halls, and meeting rooms make the resort perfect for business guests as well. Class: 4-Star Resort Location: Beach Road, Near VUDA Park, East Point Colony, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530023 Price: INR 4,500 per night onwards Distance: 5.6 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 11.7 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Dry cleaning and laundry services, blackout curtains, concierge, writing desk, airport transfers, free car parking, coffee shop, Board room and banquet halls. Private Swimming Pool: No, only a public pool 05 of 17 Best Western Ramachandra Resort Best Western Ramachandra is a modern hotel combining traditional hospitality to offer comfortable and convenient accommodation. Popular as a business boutique among the resorts in Vizag, the Best Western Ramachandra Resort provides world-class facilities for both vacationers and business travellers. They have superior rooms, deluxe rooms, suites, and premium rooms. Breakfast, wi-fi, and minibars are available for almost all types of rooms. Modern gym equipment is available at their gym to allow guests to work out. The tranquil ambience and friendly staff make your stay comfortable even with kids, though pets are not allowed in the hotel. The Utsav is their in-house multi-cuisine restaurant serving Indian, Chinese, and Tandoori treats. Athidhyam Coffee Shop is ideal for lavish vegetarian meals and fine-brewed coffee. You can relax at the Fusion bar with a wide array of drinks to choose from. The resort has three banquet halls to conduct business events and family gatherings. Class: 3-Star Resort Location: 8-8-36, Gajuwaka, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530026 Price: INR 3,150 to 8,000 per night Distance: 5.6 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 11.7 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Babysitting and kid’s meals, dry cleaning and laundry services, safety deposit box, currency exchange, concierge, airport transfers, free car parking, spa and wellness centre. Private Swimming Pool: No, only a public pool 06 of 17 Pema Wellness Resort Pema Wellness is a pristine resort in Vizag focussed on the holistic wellness of its patrons. Tucked away in the lap of nature, it is situated in a calm and serene location overlooking the Bay of Bengal. The resort is perfect for rebalancing the body, mind, and spirit away from the bustle of the city. The destination is suitable for those interested in Naturopathy treatments, Yoga, Meditation, and Wellness treatments. The resort features luxurious and allergy-free rooms and suites. Some rooms offer bay views, while others have attached balconies. A private beach provides a safe setting for practising Yoga and rejuvenating. You can choose a 7, 10 or 15 days package to help yourself unwind and rediscover yourself. The resort offers holistic health care programs including Naturopathy, Yogic, Manipulative, Hydro, Physio, and Acupuncture activities. They have a unique diet and nutrition system. Traditional medical systems from India, Tibet, and China are used to define a diet for each person. The resort's elegant restaurant, which overlooks the Bay of Bengal, delivers a perfect blend of healthy and delectable vegetarian gourmet cuisine created by nutritionists and physicians. Class: 5-Star Resort Location: Pema Wellness Resort, Healing Hills, Visakhapatnam - 530045 Price: Starting from INR 1,95,000 per package Distance: 16.7 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 24.8 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Gym, Spa and sauna, healing centre, blackout curtains, private beach, free parking, outdoor reflexology track, nature walking trail, Kriya Rooms and Yoga Halls, Library, and more Private Swimming Pool: No, only a public pool 07 of 17 Sunray Village Resort Sunray Village Resort is a luxury resort in Vizag, offering a comfortable stay to its guests. Sprawling over 120 acres of greenery, it has stunning architecture. The modern infrastructure is complemented by their courteous staff and well-equipped rooms. Guests can unwind at the two large outdoor swimming pools as they build a connection with their pristine surroundings. You can pick from their deluxe rooms, executive rooms, or air-conditioned villas. All rooms are furnished with a flat-screen TV, a writing desk, a locker, and a wardrobe. The bathroom includes shower facilities and free toiletries. Natural light floods the rooms through large windows, which also offer the best views of the lush surroundings. The property features artificial ponds where you can feed the fish. Their in-house multi-cuisine restaurant, Blossom serves delicious International food in an elegant setting. Special attention is given to guests with diet or Jain cuisine requirements. You can also enjoy a drink at their bar-Orchid while gorging on specialty meals from across the globe. Class: 4-Star Resort Location: NH-5 at Bhogapuram, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh Price: INR 4,500 per night onwards Distance: 43.9 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 50 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Gym, Spa, Sun terrace, Barbeque facility, Golf, Badminton, Tennis, Cycling, games room, kid’s club, water sports, Wi-fi, airport transfers, currency exchange, concierge, luggage storage Private Swimming Pool: No, two public pools 08 of 17 Bheemili Resort Bheemili Resort is among the best pet-friendly resorts in Vizag. Equipped with modern amenities, it is suitable for both leisure and business travellers. The sea-facing property offers a remarkable experience to its guests. You can enjoy vistas of the Bheemili beach and wake up to the splendid scenery of the sun rising over the Bay of Bengal. The resort provides deluxe rooms with modern elements as well as world-class services. Their rooms have spacious balconies, uninterrupted Wi-Fi services, an electronic safe, intercom, smoke detectors, and a business desk to provide ultimate convenience to the guests. Explore a wide range of International and Japanese cuisines at their restaurant known as ‘Teppanyaki’. An in-house lounge and bar serve world-class tropical beverages and spirits allowing you to enjoy a relaxed evening. The resort also features theatre-style conference rooms with high-tech conferencing facilities, suitable for business and family events. Class: 5-Star Resort Location: Bheemili Beach Road, Bheemunipatnam, Visakhapatnam 531163 Price: INR 6,000 per night onwards Distance: 30 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 41 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Pet friendly, Gym, Spa, private balcony, free parking, concierge, currency exchange, airport transfers, kid’s club, bar & lounge, conference hall. Private Swimming Pool: No, Infinity pool 09 of 17 Haritha Beach Resort Haritha Beach Resort is located on Rushikonda Beach and is maintained by Andhra Pradesh Tourism Development Corporation (APTDC). It is one of the budget-friendly resorts in Vizag, offering a safe stay for families. The modern infrastructure of the hotel offers a comfortable stay to guests. They offer standard, deluxe, executive, luxury, and president suites. All rooms are equipped with basic amenities and are affordably priced. You can enjoy picturesque views of the gardens and spellbinding views of the sea from your room. All rooms are equipped with LCD TV, 24 hours power backup, and toiletries. The in-house restaurant serves Indian and Continental cuisine as you unwind amidst the natural scenery. Special arrangements for events and gatherings can be made upon request. Facilities such as romantic candlelight dinners are also provided by the resort upon additional payment. Class: 3-Star Resort Location: Beach resort, Rushikonda, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530045 Price: INR 2,000 to 5,200 per night Distance: 14.4 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 22.2 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Private balcony, oceanview, room service, airport transfers, air-conditioned rooms, city tour guide. Check for charges applicable to the services at the resort information desk. Private Swimming Pool: No, only a public pool 10 of 17 Bay Leaf Ayurveda Spa and Resort Bay Leaf Ayurveda Spa and Resort is a beautiful wellness retreat situated on Ocean Drive in Sagarnagar. Nestled amidst lush landscapes, the resort offers meticulously decorated cottages. The resort also offers Ayurveda treatment at its specialised centres. You can select from their Cottage and Deluxe Cottage stays for a refreshing vacation. Guests can enjoy breathtaking views of the sea while enjoying rejuvenating treatments. Laundry, car rentals, and housekeeping services are offered upon demand. Bay Leaf Ayurveda Spa and Resort is among the best wellness resorts in Vizag. Their in-house Ayurveda therapists offer world-class massages and treatments. They are skilled in body treatments and offer a refreshing experience to guests from all over the world. Their in-house restaurant serves healthy meals and a breakfast buffet. The dietary needs of the patrons are taken care of by the resort and special vegetarian meals are also available. Class: 3-Star Resort Location: Plot-A, Beach Road, Beside Zoo Back Gate, Ocean Drive, Sagar Nagar, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530045 Price: INR 2,990 to 3,990 per night Distance: 8 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 18 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Spa and wellness treatments, Carom, kids play area, airport and railway station transfers, car rentals, multilingual staff, dry cleaning and laundry facilities, currency exchange. Private Swimming Pool: No pool 11 of 17 Sea Breeze Resort Sea Breeze Resort is among the most affordable resorts in Vizag. They have spacious rooms and modern infrastructure with adequate facilities for guests. Situated near Bheemili beach, the resort offers the best place for a refreshing vacation. Their rooms have been painstakingly designed with intricate decor and a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, and a home theatre. Most rooms have a private balcony with a splendid view of the beach or a serene view of the resort’s pool. Guests at the resort can enjoy a la carte menu comprising palatable regional dishes. Their bar and cafe are perfect to enjoy the sea view while sipping on a beverage of your choice. You can also walk down to the nearby fine-dining and multi-cuisine restaurants for a hearty meal. Class: 2-Star Resort Location: Sea Breeze Resort, Plot No. 10, Nerellavalasa Colony, Bheemili, Near Novotel Hotel (Bheemili), Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 531163 Price: INR 1,000 per night onwards Distance: 29.3 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 37 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Multilingual staff, dry cleaning and laundry facilities, power backup, housekeeping, room service, caretaker, parking facility (chargeable). Private Swimming Pool: No, only a public pool 12 of 17 Bay Breeze Resorts Bay Breeze Resorts is a quaint property in the heart of the city. The rural charm of the resort takes you away from the hustle and bustle of the city. The property is idyllically set amidst greenery to enhance its beauty. They offer eco-friendly stay options suitable for business travellers and tourists alike. Their well-appointed rooms are hygienic and well-ventilated to give you a taste of village life. To add comfort to your stay, the rooms are equipped with modern amenities such as cable television, an electronic safe, an air-conditioner, and an attached bathroom. The decor including bed and furniture are designed meticulously and are bound to capture your attention. Most rooms have a balcony overlooking the property pool and garden. The in-house restaurant serves an array of Coastal Andhra delicacies to satiate your taste buds. A banquet hall on the ground floor of the resort can easily accommodate around 200 people for a family event though it may not be suitable for a business gathering. Class: 3-Star Resort Location: Beach Road 347/9A, Thimmapuram, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 531162 Price: INR 2,500 per night onwards Distance: 4.9 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 13.7 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Multilingual staff, room service, free Wi-fi, kid’s play area, free parking, power backup, lawn, in-room safe, caretaker, room service. Private Swimming Pool: No, only a public pool 13 of 17 Fairfield by Marriott Fairfield by Marriott is among the pocket-friendly luxury resorts of Vizag. The modern and upscale infrastructure is complemented with spacious rooms. Located just minutes away from the airport, it is a popular choice among tourists and business travellers. The resort features deluxe, executive and junior suites for a relaxing stay. Their rooms are furnished with hypoallergenic flooring, indulgent bedding, plush furniture, and floor-to-ceiling windows. Other amenities include mini-refrigerators, complimentary Wi-Fi, toiletries, and a tea or coffee maker. Suites are perfect for families as they are accompanied by living rooms, marble bathrooms, and grocery services. Their 24-hour market serves complimentary Grab n' Go breakfast, coffee, and snacks. Lavish meals can be enjoyed at Kava, the in-house multi-cuisine restaurant. The sunlight-infused restaurant is renowned for its scrumptious buffet. Liquid Lounge Bar serves the finest drinks and cocktails with chef special starters. Custom catering and banquet facilities are also available at the resort, making it suitable for business conferences, weddings, and other events. Class: 4-Star Resort Location: KSR Prime, R&B Junction, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530018 Price: INR 3,429 to 7,049 per night Distance: 7 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 3.6 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Fitness centre, Spa and wellness centre, Steam room, free parking, bar, multicuisine restaurant, dining area, currency exchange, ATM, free Wi-Fi. Private Swimming Pool: No, rooftop infinity pool 14 of 17 Radisson Blu Resort The Radisson Blu Resort offers a perfect blend of nature and culture of Andhra Pradesh. The elegant rooms are perfect for a relaxing holiday. The resort offers a fun-filled getaway with your loved ones at the beach. It is one of the most popular resorts in Vizag to organise elaborate parties. You can pick from their multiple event venues that can accommodate all kinds of gatherings running from intimate parties to large festivities. You can choose from seven different room styles and enjoy modern conveniences. The rooms have private balconies facing the beautiful Rushikonda beach and others overlooking their exuberant garden. Superior rooms have basic amenities whilst suites have separate kitchen and dining areas. Lavish Villas offer facilities like a private pool and jacuzzi, making them perfect for a luxury vacation. Presidential suites offer undulating views of both the beach and garden. They offer more space with two balconies and a separate dining room. The resort has in-house restaurants offering a variety of cuisines. ‘Ethnic’ showcases the region's rich culture through its à la carte menu offering a wide range of South Indian delicacies. Enjoy the all-day international buffet meal and live cooking at '365,' or unwind with nibbles and beverages at their cafe-cum-bar 'Upper Deck’. Class: 5-Star Resort Location: Rushikonda Beach Road, Visakhapatnam, 530045 Price: INR 12,000 to 22,000 per night Distance: 15 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 23 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Gym, Spa, private balcony, sea/garden view rooms, free parking, Shuttle, kids club, bar and lounge, multicuisine restaurant, convention centre, meeting rooms Private Swimming Pool: No, only a public pool 15 of 17 Four Points by Sheraton Four Points by Sheraton is a luxury resort in Vizag offering a combination of chic infrastructure and modern comfort. Situated near the famous RK Beach, the resort makes travelling to major tourist attractions and business centres a breeze. It also features the city's only ozonized pool to offer a refreshing dip. Their fully-equipped 24-hour fitness centre is perfect for a quick workout. Their rooms are categorised into deluxe, premium, executive, and suites. You can enjoy the astounding views of the resort’s pool and garden from their rooms. The suite offers excellent vistas of the city’s skyline. Guests can indulge in delectable global cuisine at the resort’s all-day restaurant known as Best Brews. You can also enjoy authentic local specialities at their popular restaurant known as Eatery. Grab a cocktail and enjoy their daily happy hours at their casual bar and lounge. Their contemporary venues are perfect for business events and family functions. Class: 5-Star Resort Location: 10-28-3 Uplands, Waltair Main Road, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530003 Price: INR 3,429 to 13,999 per night Distance: 3.6 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 11.7 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Live sport events (broadcast), terrace, bar and lounge, restaurant, Barbeque and picnic area, free Wi-Fi, library, fitness centre with a personal trainer, spa, soundproof rooms, business centre, airport shuttle, easy accessibility for differently abled Private Swimming Pool: No, only a public pool 16 of 17 Sai Priya Beach Resort Sai Priya Beach Resort is nestled amidst sprawling gardens and offers magnificent vistas of the Bay of Bengal. The resort’s strategic location makes it a favourite among tourists. They offer well-maintained rooms and top-notch services through their courteous staff. You can pick from their deluxe and premium rooms for a regal stay at an affordable price. The spacious rooms are furnished with modern furniture, flatscreen TV, toiletries, and other amenities. Premium rooms are accompanied by a spacious balcony from where you can enjoy the splendid surroundings. Their ravishing lawns also house a multi-cuisine restaurant known as Another Fine Day and a fine-dining space known as Bay Retreat. Business events or family gatherings such as birthday parties and anniversaries can also be organised at the resort. You can select one of their four banquets from Sai Suraj 1, Sai Suraj 2, Little Goa, and Board Room. Class: 3-Star Resort Location: 5,170, Chinna Rushikonda, Bheemili Beach Road, Rushikonda, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530045 Price: INR 3,429 to 13,999 per night Distance: 14.4 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 22.2 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Restaurant and coffee shop, laundry services, free parking, travel desk business centre, cottage stays. Private Swimming Pool: No, only a public pool 17 of 17 Beaches & Hills Resort Beaches & Hills Resort is located on Yarada Beach with magnificent views of the Bay of Bengal. It is among the most couple-friendly resorts in Vizag. The property is located in well-maintained natural surroundings. Their well-maintained rooms are classified as royal and premium rooms. All rooms are affordably priced and furnished with flatscreen TV and other amenities. The rooms offer uninterrupted views of the sea and majestic natural surroundings. You can indulge in traditional delicacies at their multi-cuisine restaurant known as Cafe O. The property also features a swimming pool, though it can be accessed only after paying the additional charges. Class: 3-Star Resort Location: Bheemili, Andhra Pradesh 531163 Price: INR 2,000 to 5,000 per night Distance: 30.7 km from Visakhapatnam Railway Station, 40.8 km from Visakhapatnam International Airport Amenities/Activities: Restaurant, free parking, room service, dining area, and power backup.
